Properties

CodeURLTypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0161 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
N Substitutions are NOT authorized. (This is the default - null.)Substitutions are NOT authorized. (This is the default - null.)
G Allow generic substitutions.Allow generic substitutions.
T Allow therapeutic substitutionsAllow therapeutic substitutions

Additional Language Displays

CodeDeutsch (German, de)
NSubstitution nicht erlaubt
GSubstitution durch Generika erlaubt
TTherapieorientierte Substitution erlaubt

name: AllowSubstitution
title: allowSubstitution
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts  which specify whether substitutions are allowed and, if so, the type of substitutions allowed.    Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the RXO segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0161 (Allow Substitution)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.display: Substitutions are NOT authorized.  (This is the default - null.)
concept.definition: Substitutions are NOT authorized.  (This is the default - null.)
